posts.post_content:
Neat early Presidents card of the first 17 Presidents, its dated 1866 in the small print to the left of Washington.
Nice oddball vintage item produced a decade before the National League was founded.
And it won't break the bank. Slabbed in SGC's Postcard holder , the CDV measures approx 4" x 2.5" Back is blank.

SOLD!

Email  [url]jaycos@qualitycards.com[/url] 

[IMG]http://www.qualitycards.com/pictures/1259026107.jpg[/IMG]
